amendatorysection.catchline: Vehicle towed away; properly parked; liability.
amendatorysection.para: Any owner or tenant causing the towing away of a vehicle that is not improperly parked on a restricted lot shall cause the return of the vehicle to its owner or driver at no charge to such owner or driver. The person causing the vehicle to be towed shall be liable for any reasonably foreseeable damage incurred by the owner or driver of the vehicle due to loss of transportation.
